nodes.text: Star Wars: Rivals is the first Star Wars real-time competitive action shooter for mobile. It was released in June 2017 in Australia and New Zealand. The game features a single-player campaign which follows several different characters from the films, as well as real-time player-versus-player skirmishes. The game was cancelled in September of 2018 and those who had it installed on their devices, only had access to it until October 11, 2018.
Fans in Australia, New Zealand and Canada can now download Star Wars: Rivals™, the first real-time Star Wars competitive action shooter designed specifically for mobile devices.

Take aim and confront your rivals with fast-paced shooter gameplay in both single-player campaign scenarios and epic real-time PvP skirmishes. Collect a cast of iconic characters spanning all eras of the Star Wars universe, including Darth Vader, Luke Skywalker, Boba Fett, Princess Leia, Finn, Captain Phasma, and more. Build the ultimate combat team, anticipate your opponent's strategy, and leverage your surroundings to gain the upper hand.
